snippet: A logging truck and a train collided Friday on Route 250 about 160 miles east of Charleston, killing one person and injuring more than 60 others, officials said.
abstract: Logging truck and a train collide on Route 250 in West Virginia, killing one person and injuring more than 60 others.
lead_paragraph: A logging truck and a train collided Friday on Route 250 about 160 miles east of Charleston, killing one person and injuring more than 60 others, officials said.

headline.main: West Virginia: One Dead, Scores Injured in Collision
headline.print_headline: West Virginia: 1 Dead, 23 Injured in Collision
